_sText:
This map is a very fun surf map with alot of easy to get to weapon spawnders these weapon spawners have a like beacon whitch shows the weapon and where it is for those people who are new to the map. this map has alot of fun and cool jumps so have fun!!!

it has been updated to fix some of the bugs and make it easyer to surf for on some of the ramps it has a boost for extra speed on the jumps

there is also now a what i call a pool of youth named arfter the "fountain of youth" it is for the newbies who hav low heath and need to heal it is located just under the waterfall.
